document.title: Window of The Super
document.abstract: Title: Window of The Super Caption: This piece of art I made based on \"The Book of Unknown Americans\" by Cristina Henr√≠quez. It symbolizes how the main focus of \"The Super\" or white supremacy over minorites; minorities are sometimes treated with half the rights as an American which is why the hands are given tattered flags. As the artist and being of color, I drew this to connect with this art personally. \"We\'re the unknown Americans, the ones no one even wants to know, because they\'ve been told they\'re supposed to be scared of us...\" - \"The Book of Unknown Americans\"
document.publication-title: Student Art in the Library 2015 Fall

field.name: rights
field.value: Rights are retained by the artist. Direct usage requests to the artist.
